entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CommunityToolkit.Popups and Shell doesn't like each other #7941
  • AppShell crashed on Android #7940
  • [Win/Entry-Editor] MaxLength property is not respected when you assign text from code #7939
  • Build Action: BundleResource does not exist. #7938
  • [Win] Editor's CursorPosition and SelectionLength properties are not limited to Text.Length #7937
  • webAuthenticator controller sample uses the wrong name for expires_in #7936
  • [iOS] ProgressBar and Label don't correctly obey height and width at the core level #7935
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Blazor project template should be consistent in indentation type (spaces vs. tabs) #7934
  • [iOS] Label in Scrollview doesn't show on iOS #7933
  • Unable to block popups in BlazorWebView #7930
  • ImageButton does not respect the height and width given to it #7927
  • TextColor does not work correctly in Windows for the Picker and DatePicker. #7924
  • [MacOS] Program not crashing after throwing exception #7923
  • Gesture detector event calling issue? #7921
  • Add a property on WebView to set additional headers #7920
  • Mac Catalyst Remove existing MenuBarItem #7919
  • MultiWindow on iPad OS (splitview) share same underlying instance #7917
  • Adding 365 Views in a Grid takes forever #7916

Closed

  • FlyoutBackgroundImage Not showing Windows and Crashes IOS #7763
    6.0-sr2
  • Control status bar #7922
  • Shell: Flyoutitems IsVisible set false - what is expected behaviour? #7769
  • Maui multi target projects don't appear to support linked files? #7717
  • Black area above and below the application with iOS #7721
  • Build / Publish solution in Developer PowerShell #7625
  • [Android] RendererToHandlerShim found for Custom ShellRenderer is Incompatible #7888
  • Blazor Hybrid Publishing Validation #6393
    .NET 7

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Titlebar visibility when backbutton is present #7932
  • Bump NSubstitute from 4.2.2 to 4.3.0 #7928
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Border Background not changed to Brush once we set the Gradient #7926
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Catalyst] Fix brushes in Frame #7925
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [iOS] Fix exception using FlyoutBackgroundImage #7879
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, fatal
  • VisualTreeElement methods need to use DP vs PX #7904
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/ui-tools, do-not-merge, 6.0-sr2
  • Move the PublicAPI into unversioned files #7931

Updated

  • Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Backport main to net7.0 #7908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix windows things #7830
    area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2.1 #7890
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Implement logic to move focus to next Entry #5740
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Show keyboard when Entry, Editor and SearchBar get focus #5995
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Fix issue updating Slider Maximum value #7610
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix issue using DynamicResource TextColor on Label FormattedString #7793
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue clipping RadioButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 119.1.0 to 120.0.0.8 #7892
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Alert on modal page #7898
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert
